isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - ALCOHOL EVAPORATOR (BENDIX AE-1) - SERVICE CHECKS

svcproc.title: SERVICE CHECKS
svcproc.para: Proof that evaporator is functioning can be determined by:

step1.para: If a glass jar is being used, alcohol should bubble when engine is revved (compressor loaded).
If a plastic jar or metal can is used, check exhaust or reservoir drain for odor of alcohol.
